streams.title: What sectors will the employee be working in?
streams.description: Select the work stream that best describes the position

options.title: Civil Construction
options.best_for: Road construction, bridges, and major infrastructure projects
options.watch_out: Must follow civil construction safety standards

award_references.text: Civil construction work means the construction, alteration, maintenance or repair of civil and/or mechanical engineering projects, structures or works.

options.title: Electrical/Electronic
options.best_for: Power systems, control systems, and electrical installations

award_references.text: Electrical work means the installation, maintenance, repair or testing of electrical equipment or systems.

options.title: Fabrication
options.best_for: Metal structures, welding, and custom fabrication
options.watch_out: Requires welding certifications and safety training

award_references.text: Metal fabrication work means the fabrication, assembly, erection, installation, maintenance, repair or dismantling of metal structures.

options.title: General Construction
options.best_for: Building construction and general site work
options.watch_out: Must follow building codes and standards

award_references.text: General building work means the construction, alteration, maintenance or repair of buildings and structures.

options.title: Mechanical
options.best_for: Plant equipment, machinery, and mechanical systems

award_references.text: Mechanical work means the installation, maintenance, repair or testing of mechanical equipment or systems.
